item.title: Engine::Audio Reference
item.description: Classes Name class AudioManager An audio manager that accepts multiple Audio::AudioBuffer instances. class AudioBuffer A simple audio buffer to hold PCM samples Functions Name functions doSomething(AudioBuffer & buffer) Do something with the buffer.
